The Disinheritance of Saizaburo

(才三勘当) (Saiza kandō)

Performance: November 1970: The Love-Inspired Murder

Production: November 1970

Narrators:

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))

Shamisen (Musicians):

Nozawa Kichibei IX (野澤吉兵衛 (九))
